original_title: The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit
overview: Tom Rath is a suburban father and husband haunted by his memories of World War II, including a wartime romance with Italian village girl Maria, which resulted in an illegitimate son he's never seen. Pressed by his unhappy wife to get a higher-paying job, Rath goes to work as a public relations man for television network president Ralph Hopkins. Drawn into poisonous office politics, Tom finds he must choose his career or his family.
tagline: His loves...his world---both past and present---and the crisis they caused!
title: The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit
